org.iso_relax.miaou.mySs
Class GroupNormalizer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.iso_relax.miaou.mySs.GroupNormalizer
public class GroupNormalizer
extends java.lang.Object

This class reorders operands of groups so that attributes precede non-attributes.

Version:
0.3
Author:
MURATA Makoto
